SKT_FIRST.name: Fiend's Courtesy
SKT_FIRST.true_desc:
Attacks an enemy.

Before attacking, if the caster's current Health is <color=#28d9ed>85%</color> or lower, recovers Health of the <color=#28d9ed>caster</color> by <color=#28d9ed>5%</color>.

Before attacking, if the caster's current Health is greater than <color=#28d9ed>85%</color>, recovers Health of the ally with the lowest Health by <color=#28d9ed>5%</color> of Nella's Max Health.

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Effects are applied to all allies

SKT_BURST_2.effect: Health Recovery +15%\nTarget Action Points +50 (Excluding the caster)
SKT_BURST_2.effect_jp: HP回復量+15%\n対象AP+50(自分を除く)

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Changes to Enhanced Attack\n+2 turns Immunity for all allies
SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 強化攻撃に変更\n味方全体に免疫+2ターン

description:
Attacks an enemy.

Before attacking, if the caster's current Health is <color=#28d9ed>85%</color> or lower, recovers Health of the <color=#28d9ed>caster</color> by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000083_1_1]</color>.

Before attacking, if the caster's current Health is greater than <color=#28d9ed>85%</color>, recovers Health of the ally with the lowest Health by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000083_1_2]</color> of Nella's Max Health.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr:
적을 공격합니다.

공격 전 자신의 현재 체력이 <color=#28d9ed>85%</color> 이하라면 <color=#28d9ed>자신</color> 체력의 <color=#28d9ed>5%</color>를 회복합니다.

공격 전 자신의 현재 체력이 <color=#28d9ed>85%</color>를 초과한다면 체력 상황이 가장 나쁜 아군의 체력을 넬라 최대 체력의 <color=#28d9ed>5%</color>만큼 회복시킵니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp:
敵単体にダメージを与える。

攻撃前、自分の残りHPが<color=#28d9ed>85%</color>以下の場合、<color=#28d9ed>自分</color>のHPを<color=#28d9ed>5%</color>回復する。

攻撃前、自分の残りHPが<color=#28d9ed>85%</color>を超える場合、残りHPが最も低い味方のHPをネラの最大HPの<color=#28d9ed>5%</color>回復する。

SKT_SECOND.name: Oath of Darkness
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: (Triggered Effect) When hit, activates <color=#28d9ed>Agile Response</color>.\nIncreases <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>50%</color>, and recovers <color=#28d9ed>Health</color> of all allies by <color=#28d9ed>10%</color> of Nella's Max Health. Then, increases Action Points of all allies except the caster by <color=#28d9ed>2.5%</color>.
description: (Triggered Effect) When hit, activates <color=#28d9ed>Agile Response</color>.\nIncreases <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000083_2_2]</color>, and recovers <color=#28d9ed>Health</color> of all allies by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000083_2_3]</color> of Nella's Max Health. Then, increases Action Points of all allies except the caster by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000083_2_4]</color>.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: (발동 효과) 피격 시 <color=#28d9ed>신속 대응</color> 효과가 발동합니다.\n자신의 행동 게이지가 <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> 증가하며, 아군 전체의 <color=#28d9ed>체력</color>을 넬라 최대 체력의 <color=#28d9ed>10%</color>만큼 회복시킵니다. 이후 자신을 제외한 아군 전체의 AP를 <color=#28d9ed>2.5%</color> 증가시킵니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: (発動効果)ダメージを受けた時、<color=#28d9ed>【迅速対応】</color>を発動する。\n【迅速対応】:自分の行動ゲージが<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>UPし、味方全体の<color=#28d9ed>HP</color>をネラの最大HPの<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>回復する。その後、自分を除く味方全体にAPを<color=#28d9ed>2.5%</color>獲得させる。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: The Coronation
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Increases Priority of surviving allies by <color=#28d9ed>10%</color>, then <color=#28d9ed>Resurrects (Greater)</color> all dead allies. Afterward, recovers <color=#28d9ed>Health</color> of all allies by <color=#28d9ed>10%</color> of Nella's Max Health, and grants Immunity for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
description: Increases Priority of surviving allies by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000083_3_1]</color>, then <color=#28d9ed>Resurrects (Greater)</color> all dead allies. Afterward, recovers <color=#28d9ed>Health</color> of all allies by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000083_3_3]</color> of Nella's Max Health, and grants Immunity for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000083_3_4] turn(s)</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 생존한 아군의 행동 게이지를 <color=#28d9ed>10%</color> 증가시킨 후, 사망한 아군 전체를 <color=#28d9ed>부활(강화)</color>시킵니다. 이후 아군 전체의 <color=#28d9ed>체력</color>을 넬라 최대 체력의 <color=#28d9ed>10%</color>만큼 회복시키고, <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 면역을 부여합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 戦場にいる味方の行動ゲージを<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>UPさせた後、倒れた味方全体を<color=#28d9ed>復活(強化)</color>させる。その後、味方全体の<color=#28d9ed>HP</color>をネラの最大HPの<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>回復させ、免疫を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与する。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: After attacking, grants <color=#28d9ed>Sustained Recovery</color> to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, recovers Health of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>15%</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: After attacking, grants <color=#28d9ed>Sustained Recovery</color> to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000083_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, recovers Health of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000083_backup_1_1]</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 스타터 효과</color> : 공격 후 아군 전체에게 <color=#28d9ed>지속 회복</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 부여합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 자신의 체력을 <color=#28d9ed>15%</color> 회복합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(初手)</color>:攻撃後、味方全体に<color=#28d9ed>継続回復</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与する。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、自分のHPを<color=#28d9ed>15%</color>回復する。
